title: MAG 062 - First Edition Transcript
text:

One that hasn't changed in the eight years since this statement was given. 
There's never been any reason to look closely at a random section of floor. This 
bit wasn't even breached by any of the worms. 
[Floorboards are moved.] 
Because it had Gertrude's hidden compartment beneath it. Mmm. No strange 
skin page. But there is a laptop. And a key. I wonder what it opens? 
End supplement. 
[Tape clicks off.]

The Magnus Archives – Episode 062 – First Edition 
 
18 
 
It featured: Sue Sims as Gertrude Robinson, Carrie Cohen as Mary Keay and 
Jonathan Sims as The Archivist.
